name: UwUFUFU

name: Wikipedia Speedruns!
description: Race through Wikipedia pages to reach a target article as fast as possible.

name: More or Less game
description: Guess if the next item is higher or lower in value compared to the previous.

name: DAMN DOG
description: Guess the Wikihow article's title

name: Framed
description: Guess the movie by seeing one frame at a time.

name: The Higher Lower Game
description: Guess what gets Googled more.

name: Le Petit Bac
description: Word game where you find words starting with the same letter.

name: Connect the stars
description: Find links betweens celebrities

name: Make it Meme
description: Compete to create the funniest memes from random templates.

name: Tier List Maker
description: Rank items, characters, or ideas into custom tier lists.

name: Guess The.Game
description: Identify a video game from a progressively revealed screenshot.

name: Tixid
description: A storytelling card game where players use abstract illustrations to spark creative clues and imaginative guesses.

name: BombParty
description: Type words with given letter combos before the bomb explodes.

name: PopSauce
description: Party trivia game mixing pop culture, images, and quick guesses.

name: OpenGuessr
description: Guess locations on a map based on Street View images.

name: sQuiz
description: Online quiz game with multiple categories and fast-paced challenges.

name: Codenames
description: Give clever clues to help your team guess the right words on the grid.

name: skribbl.io
description: Draw and guess words.

name: Gartic Phone
description: Telephone Game with drawings and texts.

name: Who Said It?
description: Guess who said the quote: Trump, Kanye, or H*tler.

name: Linkterpol
description: Guess if the portrait is from LinkedIn or from Interpol.

name: Pédantix
description: Discover the Wikipedia page.

name: Cémantix
